story.name: 3bedec0d-6b98-49f5-982c-0dde05ae7fc0
story.title: Michelin to close Bamberg, Germany plant by early 2021
story.summary: MICHELIN-GERMANY/BAMBERG (URGENT):Michelin to close Bamberg, Germany plant by early 2021

xmlText.p: Michelin to close Bamberg, Germany plant by early 2021
PARIS, Sept 25 (Reuters) - France's Michelin is planning to close its Bamburg plant in Germany by early 2021, it said in a statement on Wednesday.
The company will record a provision of around 167 million euros ($183.42 million) in its 2019 accounts to fund the move, it said.

Michelin said it will implement a support programme for each of the factory's 858 employees. Negotiations with labour organisations will take place to define how these measures will be implemented, it added. ($1 = 0.9105 euros) (Reporting by GV De Clercq; Editing by Jan Harvey)
